db:abstract.db:para: The QSGDynamicTexture class serves as a baseclass for dynamically changing textures, such as content that is rendered to FBO's.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: To update the content of the texture, call updateTexture() explicitly. Simply calling bind() will not update the texture.

db:note.db:para: All classes with QSG prefix should be used solely on the scene graph's rendering thread. See Scene Graph and Rendering for more information.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QSGDynamicTexture::updateTexture()
db:section.db:para: Call this function to explicitly update the dynamic texture.
The function returns true if the texture was changed as a resul of the update; otherwise returns false.

db:note.db:para: This function is typically called from QQuickItem::updatePaintNode() or QSGNode::preprocess(), meaning during the synchronization or the node preprocessing phases of the scenegraph. Calling it at other times is discouraged and can lead to unexpected behavior.
